roleset.name: to set up, manipulate,
roleset.note: RIG-V NOTES: Frames file for 'rig' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from rig.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: rig-v: passive
example.text: The prime minister 's opponents claimed [0] [the balloting , 12 votes short of a majority in Islamabad 's 237-seat assembly,]-1 was rigged [*-1] .

example.name: rig-n
example.text: It seems that, sometime in the 1830s, one of the alien bureaucrats messed up the election rig.

example.name: rig_up-v: transitive
example.text: After [*-3] discovering that the hacker had taken over the dormant account of a legitimate user named [*]Joe Sventek , he rigged up an alarm system , including a portable beeper , [0] [*T*-1] to alert him when Sventek came on the line [*T*-2] .
